Sentence: Lee Scoresby, meanwhile, has found Stanislaus Grumman, who tells him (Will) that his (Will) name is actually John Parry and that he (Will) comes from another world
Lee Scoresby and John Parry, traveling in Lee's balloon, enter into the world of Ci'gazze
The fourth lands, and Lee dies in the fight to hold off the soldiers while Parry runs ahead to meet the knife bearer
